Since the strategy prioritizes engaging the butterflies while keeping the cocoons safe, I should move toward an available direction. The closest butterflies are located at (6, 12) and (7, 4 to 12). 

To engage effectively, I will move down to row 2 and then onward towards the butterflies. Hence, my action will be to move one step down.

``` Action:3 ```
This action should facilitate further movement towards engaging the butterflies without compromising the cocoons. I expect to see some progress in closing the distance to the nearby threats in the next turn.

The strategy is to prioritize engaging with the butterflies while ensuring the cocoons remain protected. Observing the map, I note that butterflies (@) are present nearby, particularly at positions (6, 12) below and around the row of my current position.

To move towards the nearest butterfly, I should go further down. The subsequent row (3) is also clear, which will allow me to keep progressing toward butterflies without obstruction.
